title: Unable to connect to the login queue..
body: Keep getting this error while trying to login, restarted router + computer, still nothing. Has to be something on your guys end. =(

replies.body: Same issue. When loading into game before the champions appeared I received an error message. Tried to relog into the client and the "Sign In' button is grey'd out for me and can't be clicked. Attempted to resolve with the hextech tool to no avail. According to the front page of the board there seems to be other users experiencing the same issue.

Strange...maybe something is going on?  We had some issues last week where players who disconnected during a match received an offline or gray sign in error.  Try these steps and let me know if it works for you:

Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Open "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" with notepad
Find the line:

gameflow-patcher-lock:

Delete this whole line
Save the file, restart your LoL Client - and you should be able to log in again.
Quick followup: Was able to connect to game and everything seemed to be in order. Appreciate it again

Appreciate the reply. Ended up resetting my modem after posting the comment and it seems that was enough to prompt the "client patch" notification and allow me to log back in. Went ahead and followed your instructions just in case. Attempting to start another game right now, we'll see if the issue is cleared up. As an aside of pure PJSalt, having low mmr in d5 and losing 21lp for a remake feels pretty bad, would be interesting in the future to see if maybe a more normalized loss of lp for connection issues like a dodge penalty possibly.

Power cycling your router was a good step, because this issue can usually be caused by a network issue struggling to reach the authentication server.  I don't see any issues on our side with authentication servers currently, but it's always good to check.  In this case, I recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear any blocks along the way and reach us.  Hop it helps!
